Rat Trap reports to Legacy.

"We had ta leave our last location due ta a ma=
jor pest problem.  I can tell ya though, we didn't get too far, about five =
hundred cliks north by north west of our original location.  That's where y=
ou'll find Night Shift.  Oh, he's got some large friends lookn' after 'em r=
ight now, I'll go back there too'n wait for Ramulus, over."

He looks down =
to his large stegosaurous friend.

"We gotta go back, help's commn' ta us a=
nd I don't think your family's gonna recognize 'em."

The stegosaurous turn=
s around and heads back to his original location.

"Night Shift, we're comm=
n' back, Legacy just replied, Ramulus is gonna meet up with us, so just han=
g tight okay?"

Night Shift recieves Rat Trap's transmission.

"Gotchya, no=
t like I can go anywhere anyway.  Might as well make the best of it.  Besid=
es, these guys, they're all right.  I got some serious back up around me an=
d I don't think they'll let anything through unless we tell 'em they're on =
our side."

One stego looks down to Night Shift making sure he's unharmed. =
 He smiles and rubs her nose.

"I'm okay.  My friends are commn' back ta he=
lp me out."

Meanwhile, another stego scouts the area where Night Shift and=
 Rat Trap had just fled.  He had been with the family originally, and appea=
rs to be one of the oldest members of the herd.  He picks up a familliar sc=
ent, yet not Night Shift, but the scent of another comrade, and follows it.=
  It leads him close to Ramulus.  He spots the Maximal, and waits for his a=
pproach, quietly gurgling his growl, and lowering his head as if to try and=
 get him to follow him.

can, and this time I'll bring backup. Okay big guy, we gotta hussle."

ver, Night Shift's damages are more serious than I thought, so I'm commn' b=

ta base, over'n out."

therwise indisposed." He said, alluding to the fact that Rodimus is
> helpi=
ng to bring Nightlight back from the brink. "However Ramulus was
> dispatch=
ed to assist you. He had stopped by to get energon reserved
> before he lef=
t under Rodimus' orders."
>

inued, "Ramulus reported
> in a few moments ago that he had arrived at your=
 last reported
> location and was going to attempt to locate you. Are you n=
ot still
> there?"
>

 of the battle

at looked

insecticon lady bugs.
